meta.note: Household and unit counts are estimated from ACS 2023 5-year data using income distribution modeling. For precise figures, configure the serverless API endpoint.

methodology: Income thresholds use HUD FY2025 Income Limits AMI ('median income') for 4-person households, per county/MSA.
Households at or below each AMI threshold are estimated from ACS 2023 5-year table B19001 using income bin interpolation.
Priced-affordable units are estimated from ACS 2023 5-year table B25063 (cash rent only); units with gross rent at or below 30% of the AMI threshold income are counted.
Households includes all household types (renter and owner-occupied) with income at or below the threshold. Units are renter-occupied units only.
These are priced-affordable units, not guaranteed vacant/available, and do not incorporate concessions or vacancies.
County-level estimates use a lognormal income distribution model calibrated to ACS 2023 household income data for Colorado.
For precise real-time figures, configure APP_CONFIG.AMI_GAP_API_URL to point to the serverless API endpoint.
